Reviews.Title: Nice one
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: I read about this product on the web and decided to go for it. I must confess i'm not regretting it. The portability, sleekness, the os 7,lightness, the combined touch screen and keypad makes it wounderful for me.The battery life isn't as bad as i thought. I like it.

Reviews.Title: BEST PHONE EVER
Reviews.Author: BEST PHONE EVER
Reviews.Content: THIS is the most amazing phone eVER!!! works perfect with TMOBILE! is unlock and came brand new!!The only thing it was sent from mexico. but doesnt matter..! still excellent phone! SHIP WELL CAME QUICK PLUS IS ALOT BETTER THEN THE 9900! is slimmer and sexier. Has better Batttery life!

Reviews.Title: Excelent Choice
Reviews.Author: Alfonso
Reviews.Content: The Bold 9790 is a excelent choice, it's a great cell phone, works fast with all cell phone companies services providers in Venezuela (2G), but in my case, only works in 3G bands 1,4 and 8,valid for Digitel.

Reviews.Title: Good option if qwerty is your need
Reviews.Author: Rohit
Reviews.Content: Blackberry 9790 has pretty much everything that you would expect in a BB Bold, only that it is much sleeker and lighter. The thick chrome lining that runs around the edge adds to the sleekness, and differentiates it from similar looking Curve models. It is arguably the most good looking BB of recent times with one of the best performances.This one came without any logo which is the way I wanted, and they shipped to me in a week.I have heard a few stories on the short batter life - Well I don't think it's too bad and my reasoning is simple. I consider myself a moderate user -- not too many apps but still an app user -- then if you have to charge your device every night (any smartphone would need that), so how does is matter if there's 20% or 40% battery remaining at the end of your day.If you like to type a lot and have decided qwerty kb is the one for you -- then there aren't many better choices than the Bold 9790!

Reviews.Title: Mr
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd blackberry phone and after much research I decided this was the ideal upgrade blackberry for me. Functionally speaking it is much the same as older versions, but operates quicker with all up to date features you would need. It's possibly the perfect blackberry for me. But all this is all actually irrelevant because the battery life is absolutely appalling. I'm writing this review mid afternoon and my battery is already in the red. What use is all the advanced technology and modern functionality if the battery is dead? And it's not cheap .. Probably my last blackberry!

Reviews.Title: Works with band 1, 4 and 8
Reviews.Author: Atilio Morillo
Reviews.Content: excellent phone, great battery life, works with bands 1, 4 and 8. T-MOBILE!excelente telefono, funciona con las bandas 1, 4 y 8, levanta 3G con Digitel

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: janeth urribarri
Reviews.Content: On August 2, 2012, I bought a phone BlackBerry Bold, and am very disappointed in it. to 6 months it damage the charger and had to buy another original charger and now just 13 months after buying the phone is turn off and no longer works and has no remedy, I was told that it bounced him since the phone was not used more. It seems unfair that I have a phone that lasted 13 months.

Reviews.Title: Gustavo Perez
Reviews.Author: Gustavo J.
Reviews.Content: Everything is right on the product but it doesn't have the specification of the 3G bands that use it.Greeting!

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: this product presents many problems, constantly restarts and the screen turns on and off constantly, when receiving a call or message the computer shuts down, you update the software and the problem still persists, appreciate your help with this problem

Reviews.Title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Miguel Moreno Quezada "Roddy"
Reviews.Content: PRESENTS THIS MODEL PHONE FAILURE (reset).SO DO NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS TYPE OF MODEL.INVESTIGATING, INFORM ME KNOW THAT THIS TYPE OF MODEL CAME FROM THE FACTORY WITH FAULTS.

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry Bold 9790
Reviews.Author: Maikel
Reviews.Content: BlackBerry Bold 9790 me llego en buenas condiciones, vivo en Venezuela y trabaja perfectamente el 3G con Movistar y Movilnet, (Banda 2 =  850/1900Mhz).  Con Digitel no agarra el 3G, para poder usar el Digitel con 3G debes comprar un BlackBerry que trabaje con Banda 8 = 900Mhz.  Tengan en cuenta que cualquier celular que compres en Amazon para Venezuela el 3G de Movistar y Movilnet tiene que decir: 3G Band 850/1900Mhz. y para Digitel: 3G Band 900Mhz .  Hay otras marcas de Celulares que traen 3G para las tres líneas en Venezuela ( Movilnet, Movistar y Digitel ) en ese caso en las especificaciones debe decir: 3G o HSDPA 850/900/1900Mhz .  Blackberry Bold 9790 I arrived in good condition, I live in Venezuela and works perfectly with Movistar and Movilnet 3G (Band 2 = 850/1900Mhz).  With Digitel not grab the 3G to use the Digitel with 3G you buy a Blackberry to work with Band 8 = 900Mhz.  Please note that any cell phone you buy on amazon for the 3G Movistar Venezuela and Movilnet has to say: 3G Band 850/1900Mhz. and Digitel: 3G Band 900MHz.  There are other brands that bring 3G Phones for the three lines in Venezuela (Movilnet, Movistar and Digitel) in that case, the specifications must say 850/900/1900Mhz 3G or HSDPA.

Reviews.Title: OMAIRA MANRIQUE
Reviews.Author: omaira manrique
Reviews.Content: Buenas noches hoy  recibí mi teléfono y estoy muy agradecida porque llego tal cual ustedes lo describieron. Los recomiendo ampliamente.SALUDOS CORDIALESOMAIRA MANRIQUEVENEZUELA

Reviews.Title: Moderate
Reviews.Author: Luis Torres
Reviews.Content: not what I expected. detail in the keyboard and the description of the bands that the phone works. but it is a good phone

Reviews.Title: producto cumple las espectativas
Reviews.Author: mario
Reviews.Content: muy contento con mi blackberry, no he tenido ningun tipo de problema desde que lo tengo, pueden comprarlo con confianza

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: cell equipment was not new it was pin contacts and other settings and other information I demand an explanation and compensation in any way that their product was new as published and is the opposite

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very good seller, my order arrived within the stipulated time, recommend to all, five stars seller, I am satisfied with my purchase since buying amazon has always been a pleasant experience. Once you have the product in your hands you can not think of anything else other than you made an excellent choice to disburse money to acquire it. The seller will behave responsibly and comply with the details and shipping details. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.Excelente producto, muy buen vendedor, mi pedido llegó en el tiempo estipulado, lo recomiendo a todos, cinco estrellas al vendedor, estoy satisfecho con mi compra ya que comprar en amazon siempre ha sido una experiencia agradable. Una vez tienes el producto en tus manos no puedes pensar en otra cosa que no sea que hiciste una excelente elección al desembolsar dinero por adquirirlo. El vendedor se comporto responsable y cumplió con los detalles del producto y los detalles del envío. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.

Reviews.Title: Perfecto
Reviews.Author: Javier Contreras
Reviews.Content: Me encanta. Es hermoso, suena, la entrega se hizo muy rapido y en excelentes condiciones. Muchas gracias por el servicio

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Genaro Galeano
Reviews.Content: super bueno el cel llego a la fecha acordada muy buen equipo super rapido y elegante tiene un procesador muy bueno y el telefono responde rapido a la hora de buscar cosas en internet o descargar aplicaciones
